about_the_game: This pack contains 15 beautiful wallpapers and a book with the same artworks from the game Turret Girl. The wallpapers are in the resolution of 1920x1080 and they are named as follows: Artwork_1920x1080_art01, Artwork_1920x1080_art02, Artwork_1920x1080_art03, Artwork_1920x1080_art04, Artwork_1920x1080_art05, Artwork_1920x1080_art06, Artwork_1920x1080_art07, Artwork_1920x1080_art08, Artwork_1920x1080_art09, Artwork_1920x1080_art10, Artwork_1920x1080_art11, Artwork_1920x1080_art12, Artwork_1920x1080_art13, Artwork_1920x1080_art14, Artwork_1920x1080_art15. The book contains the same artworks as the wallpapers, but in a printable size, so you can enjoy the printed artworks if you want. All this in PNG and PDF Format.
detailed_description: This pack contains 15 beautiful wallpapers and a book with the same artworks from the game Turret Girl. The wallpapers are in the resolution of 1920x1080 and they are named as follows: Artwork_1920x1080_art01, Artwork_1920x1080_art02, Artwork_1920x1080_art03, Artwork_1920x1080_art04, Artwork_1920x1080_art05, Artwork_1920x1080_art06, Artwork_1920x1080_art07, Artwork_1920x1080_art08, Artwork_1920x1080_art09, Artwork_1920x1080_art10, Artwork_1920x1080_art11, Artwork_1920x1080_art12, Artwork_1920x1080_art13, Artwork_1920x1080_art14, Artwork_1920x1080_art15. The book contains the same artworks as the wallpapers, but in a printable size, so you can enjoy the printed artworks if you want. All this in PNG and PDF Format.
name: Turret Girl - Wallpapers & ArtWork
